name: The 4th Int'l Conference on Machine Learning, Pattern Recognition and Intelligent Systems
content: The 4th Int'l Conference on Machine Learning, Pattern Recognition and Intelligent Systems (MLPRIS 2021) Conference Date: July 16-18, 2021 Conference Venue: Kunming, China Website: https://www.confjuly.org/conference/MLPRIS2021/ Online Registration System: https://www.confjuly.org/RegistrationSubmission/default.aspx?ConferenceID=1367 Email: intelconf@163.com About Conference Important NOTE: Due to COVID-19 epidemic situation all over the world, most countries still maintain a strict policy of no-gathering, no-entering and leaving the country, and 14-days quarantine. We have to postpone the conference till July 16-18, 2021 in Kunming, China. Please visit the official website to get more details: http://www.confjuly.org/conference/MLPRIS2021/ The 4th Int'l Conference on Machine Learning, Pattern Recognition and Intelligent Systems (MLPRIS 2021) will be held from July 16-18, 2021 in Kunming, China. The conference will cover issues on Advanced Control and Detection Technology, Artificial Neural Networks, Audio/Speech Recognition, Music Analysis, Multimedia Systems, Biometrics, Biomedical Pattern Analysis and Information Systems, Data/web Mining and Knowledge Discovery, Human-computer Interaction, etc. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods in related fields. If you wish to serve the conference as an invited speaker, please send email to us with your CV. We'll contact with you asap.
